name: Cauliflower Salad
author: Debbie Lopez
summary: I came up with this one summer when I was on a low carb diet, it is similar to a potato salad but made without the potato.
ingredients: 1 head cauliflower, trimmed and cut into bite-size florets
¾ cup frozen green peas, thawed
directions: Place cauliflower in a large saucepan and cover with water
Bring  to a boil and cook until just fork tender, about 10 minutes
In a large bowl whisk together the mayonnaise, mustard, salt, and pepper
Add the cauliflower, eggs, onion, peas, dill pickles, and bacon to the dressing and stir until well coated
Cover and refrigerate for 2 to 24 hours
The longer the cauliflower salad chills, the better the flavor
